speaker: Setu Chokshi
title: Scaling your AI/ML practices with MLOps and Azure Machine Learning | Part 2
description:
On Part 2 of the Scaling your AI/ML practices with MLOps and Azure Machine Learning, Setu Chokshi introduces the Azure MLOps (v2) Solution Accelerator and its value proposition. He also shares some customer use-cases!

Chapters:
00:00 AI Show begins
00:18 Welcome and Introductions
01:12 What's new with the Azure MLOps Solution Accelerator
02:08 Value Proposition
04:50 Customer use cases
06:12 Soluton Accelerator goals 
08:00 Learn more https://github.com/Azure/mlops-v2
08:27 Wrap

Resources:
Learning Modules to upskill your MLOps practices https://aka.ms/MLOps/Learn
MLOps Maturity Model to evaluate MLOps adoption and take an incremental approach to MLOps adoption https://aka.ms/MLOps/MaturityModel
MLOps Solution Accelerator to bootstrap MLOps environments https://github.com/Azure/mlops-v2
Setup MLOps in Microsoft Docs https://aka.ms/MLOps/Setup
